**Checklist**

- [ ] Run `cargo fmt`.
- [ ] Run `cargo clippy`. If applicable, add:
  - [ ] `--target wasm32-unknown-unknown`
  - [ ] `--target wasm32-unknown-emscripten`
- [ ] Run `cargo xtask test` to run tests.
